name: Bally (chelomm)
description:
Controls:

W, S to Move

A, D to rotate

In the upper left corner you can switch to view walls or objects, by clicking on the buttons. You can use the mouse wheel on the mini-map to zoom in or out. 

Description:

This is a game where you need to explore the level as there is nothing visible. You need to see the object first for it to appear. You have 2 modes, search for walls & doors and objects (the only object atm are keys). The game contains only 2 levels at the moment.

This is my first game, I made this game for a JAM. All the music and sounds effects are from https://www.zapsplat.com.
